messages.subject: Re: Sandra's post, was perspective for Laura B.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/8/2003 4:25:38 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Heehee...I m thinking we need a FAQ (or is there one? Whatever...) which has these comments
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/8/2003 4:25:38 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> Sandra your writing is so powerful. I too am very impressed with your wisdom
>
> and insight. Please link it to your web site so I can return to it when
> need
> be. Thanks!
>
>

Heehee...I'm thinking we need a FAQ (or is there one? Whatever...) which has
these comments about Sandra in it. Then the next time someone comes on
complaining about the Evil Sandra and her Doddites, we can just say: Read the
FAQ!

Kathryn
